SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Server
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.SocketServer
public class SocketServer extends Server
The SocketServer class extends the Server class and represents a server that uses sockets for communication with clients.
